name: CodaProductEditor
description: A full-stack product editor application with Vue.js frontend and Node.js backend for Coda Take Home Task

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:bg --workspace=backend && npm run test:bg --workspace=frontend
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace=backend && npm run preview --workspace=frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend

author: Haziq Mumtaz
